com.wit.and.widget.adapter

Class OptMultiAdapter<Adapter extends OptBaseAdapter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.wit.and.widget.adapter.internal.BaseAdapter
        • com.wit.and.widget.adapter.OptBaseAdapter
          • com.wit.and.widget.adapter.OptMultiAdapter<Adapter>
  • Type Parameters:
    Adapter - Type of the adapter which extends this adapter.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, IMultiAdapter<Adapter>

    public abstract class OptMultiAdapter<Adapter extends OptBaseAdapter>
extends OptBaseAdapter
implements IMultiAdapter<Adapter>

    public abstract class

    OptMultiAdapter

    extends OptBaseAdapter,
    implements IMultiAdapter

    Class Overview

    As default contains default SelectionModule implementation. Selector module can be obtained under the MODULE_SELECTOR id.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    OptBaseAdapter, StateLinearLayout, StateRelativeLayout, StateView
